Series V, Legal Cases and Documents
Subseries V-B, Agee v. George Crile, Gust Avrakotos, Grove/Atlantic., the Atlantic Monthly Press, and Publishers Group West
Subseries V-B, Agee v. George Crile, Gust Avrakotos, Grove/Atlantic., the Atlantic Monthly Press, and Publishers Group West
The case claimed that Crile's book Charlie Wilson's War [Grove/Atlantic, 2003] contained false allegations that Agee was responsible for the death of Athens CIA Station Chief Richard Welsh.
